heading: Credenz Website Backend
description: • Created main website backend APIs for Technical Fest i.e. Credenz ‘20, Website will be live soon.

heading: Question Portal
description: • Website for accepting the competitive programming questions, which we used in creating the question dataset of the competitive coding events (conducted by PISB).

heading: NCC
description: • National Computing Contest (NCC) platform is used by more than 500+ participants in Credenz Tech Days. We created an Online Judge of C/CPP/Python for the contestants to submit the code
• Implemented sandboxing env to run c/cpp codes in the backend

heading: CLASH & RC
description: Clash and Reverse Coding (RC) platform is used by more than 900+ participants in Credenz ‘19 . We created an Online Judge of C/CPP/Python for the contestants to submit their code.
